title: Clerk Auth Verification

constraint_check.notes: External SaaS dependency for critical auth path. Single point of failure outside our control. $25/month cost for 40 users is poor value.

logic_check.notes: Webhook sync introduces latency and failure points for broker-deal linking. If webhook fails, RLS breaks.

fv_rationale: Overkill for 40 broker users. External dependency for critical path. Webhook complexity. Cost without commensurate benefit.
feedback: Clerk is excellent for consumer apps with thousands of users needing social auth, MFA, etc. Poor fit for B2B internal tool with ~40 known users on a single email domain.
